resources.string: Insulin preset for Humalog and NovoRapid / NovoLog
Allows you to define the peak of the insulin activity and should only be used by advanced users
Attention!\nInsulin concentration is a Safety parameter. Please CLICK HERE and READ the text and make sure you UNDERSTAND it before this value.\nThe risks of insulin overdose are very high!

string.name: insulin_concentration_doc
string.comment: For translation, only replace /en/ by /xx/ with xx your language code within wiki documentation

resources.string: Insulin concentration should be confirmed after each reservoir change.\nYou will receive a PopUp on next Insulin Change event to confirm the new Concentration
Insulin concentration can only be changed during the 15min following a reservoir change.\nCheck carefully within Insulin Plugin is the requested change has been applied
DIA of %1$f too short - using %2$f instead!
